ComicInfo.Title: Helpful Child Rearing Hints (First in a Series of); Goldilocks and the Three Bears; Hershey Highway to Success...; Wolfink 'n' Fukaduk; Nature Lovers; Surprise!

ComicInfo.Summary:
Fourteen assorted cartoons.
Farmer Brown's likes.
A day in the life
How to cope with your child's nightmares.
The fairytale recast in middle America.
Martini undergoes a transformation.
How to succeed in rock.
Wolfink eats too much.
Two really twee nature lovers in action.
